package-manager.title: Bzip2 File Compressor
package-manager.description: bzip2 is a portable, lossless data compressor based on the Burrows-Wheeler transform. It achieves good compression and runs on practically every (32/64-bit) platform in the known universe. The compression engine is also available as a library, should you desire a programmatic interface.
